item.title: JsonDocument
item.description: Generates and parses Json. Generation is catered for anonymous classes and LINQ.

item.title: ID3v2 Tag Reader
item.description: Reads ID3v2 tags/images from MP3s. Supports 2.2 - 2.4 tags, and made it easy to add support for future tags.

item.title: Base85
item.description: My own implementation of ASCII85. Maybe it could be better.

item.title: ImgChan
item.description: The heart of my ImgChan program, downloads images from a *chan thread into a given directory, asynchronously

item.title: RandomKey
item.description: Something I whipped up at work that generates a random password (w/ hashes) of a specified length and character set.

item.title: Fraction
item.description: Performs fraction math using literal fractions. I created it to understand more about operator overloading.

item.title: BitchX YouTube script
item.description: Aggregates youtube links posted in IRC.
